subject: Baseball
Bathrooms and Toilets
lead_paragraph: Mobile BayBears pitcher Matt Elliott  locked himself in the bathroom and could not get out to pitch the ninth inning against the Montgomery Biscuits in a Class AA Southern League game June 23.
snippet: Mobile BayBears pitcher Matt Elliott  locked himself in the bathroom and could not get out to pitch the ninth inning against the Montgomery Biscuits in a Class AA Southern League game June 23.
